name: Overall Hit Rate Over Time (exclusive buckets)
query: select run_at, window_range, avg(hit_rate) as hit_rate from public.analysis_windows_exclusive where job_type = 'six_hour' and run_at >= now() - interval '7 days' group by run_at, window_range, window_min order by run_at, window_min;

name: Overall New Slots vs Window (exclusive, latest run)
query: with latest as (select max(run_at) as run_at from public.analysis_windows_exclusive where job_type = 'six_hour') select window_range, sum(new_count) as new_count from public.analysis_windows_exclusive aw join latest l on aw.run_at = l.run_at where aw.job_type = 'six_hour' group by window_range, window_min order by window_min;

name: Overall Median Duration Over Time (exclusive, daily)
query: select run_at, window_range, avg(median_duration_min) as median_duration_min from public.analysis_windows_exclusive where job_type = 'daily_summary' and run_at >= now() - interval '30 days' group by run_at, window_range, window_min order by run_at, window_min;
